message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll take less to see if you'll accept!
You were too generous, I'll take more now!
You're taking more, but I'm still not giving up too much. Let's meet in the middle!
I'll take most of the money, it's my turn to be generous... not!
I'm taking a smaller share, but I'm not giving up yet. Meet me in the middle!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking most of it now!
This is my final offer. I'm taking a small share, but I'm not giving up. Meet me here or walk away with the majority.
